response_plan: Hospital Universitario Puerta del Mar is the most suitable choice due to its high bed capacity and proximity to the incident location.
action_details: In case of an emergency, prioritize transporting victims to Hospital Universitario Puerta del Mar. Location: 36.509153° N, -6.277911° W, Specializations: Trauma, Cardiology, and Neurology, Bed Capacity: 25
